ygData.subject: HELLO E'CI!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and well met my friends... I hope I am known by some, but I have not yet begun to create an image for myself like I have in other games. It is nice
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and well met my friends...<br><br>I hope I
am known by some, but I have not yet begun to create
an image for myself like I have in other games. It
is nice to see someone start a club for our server,
and it is great to be a part of it.<br><br>I play a
wood elf bard of Erollisi Marr named Telryn. He is
currently based in Kelethin, and is willing to help any who
need it (within reason).<br><br>I hope to leave good
stories or tips here, at least as many as I ask
for...<br><br>See you all soon...<br><br>Telryn Firemane<br>13th
Bard
